name: Dragon Dodge Valley
description:
Dragon Dodge Valley is a fast paced, bullet hell game where you need to dodge fireballs and incoming enemies while fighting your way through to the end.

The game is made in a retro 80's style but with a modern bullet hell twist. The intense gameplay is coupled with a permanent death mechanic, you either make it to the end... or start again from scratch!

Key Features include:


Fast paced gameplay
Perma death
Bullet Hell Mechanics

The game has an additional hard mode with no extra health in levels for the players who like the maximum challenge!
